title: Our Smoothie Bike Packages

pageHero.title: Our Packages
pageHero.description: Festivals, corporate events, fundraisers, or school programs – we have the perfect package for you.

intro.description1: Our smoothie bikes are available for rent across the region. Whether you're hosting a small family gathering or a large festival, we have a solution that fits your needs.
intro.description2: All our packages include delivery, setup and breakdown, plus a professional staff member to guide your guests through the experience. We also supply all fresh ingredients, cups and other necessary accessories.

packagesGrid.title: Discover our packages
packagesGrid.subtitle: A unique and memorable experience for every type of event

help.title: Need help choosing?
help.description: Our team can help you select the perfect package for your event or create a fully customized solution.

testimonial.text: We booked Voilà Vélo Fruité for our corporate day and it was a resounding success! The team was professional and our employees loved the experience.
testimonial.author: Marie Lemieux

laPetiteKoki.title: La Petite Koki
laPetiteKoki.tagline: Blended by your kids, powered by fun!
laPetiteKoki.heroDescription: Designed specifically for young smoothie enthusiasts aged 5-10. Watch their faces light up as they pedal their way to a delicious, healthy treat!
laPetiteKoki.note: Customization available with your brand, balloons, and decorations

popSolo.title: Pop Solo
popSolo.tagline: Blended by you, powered by fun!
popSolo.heroDescription: Perfect for small gatherings and intimate events. One bike, endless possibilities for creating memorable moments.

doubleFun.title: Double Fun
doubleFun.tagline: Twice the bikes, twice the fun!
doubleFun.heroTitle: Double the Energy, Double the Fun
doubleFun.heroDescription: With two bikes running simultaneously, create friendly competitions and double the smoothie production for your events.

readySetBlend.title: Ready, Set, Blend!
readySetBlend.heroDescription: Turn your event into an exciting smoothie-making competition with multiple bikes and organized challenges.

parentChildChallenge.title: Parent-Child Challenge
parentChildChallenge.heroDescription: A special package designed to bring families together through fun, healthy competition and cooperation.

smoothieParade.title: The Smoothie Parade
smoothieParade.tagline: A parade of flavors for large events!
smoothieParade.heroDescription: Our largest standard package, perfect for major events where you need to serve many people and create a real spectacle.

signature.title: Signature Package
signature.heroDescription: Let us create a completely customized smoothie bike experience tailored to your specific needs and vision.
